name: Beat Root - GGJ 2023
description:
Beat Root is a Rhythm Game where you must help the Allegro Tree deepen his roots into the earth with the power of music. Match the rhythm of the song or the Allegro Tree will dry up!

Controls:

Arrow Keys for directional movement

Mechanics:

Water Tiles: Fully Restores Health

Green Gem: Breaks Rocks

Credits:

Se Joon Oh - Programmer

Juan Raul Gonzalez - Programmer

Marcelo Gavilan - Programmer

Adolfo Diaz - Artist

Fabrizio Caballero - Game Design

Nicolas Dominguez - Music Artist
